name: CopyCat (2 Player)
description:
A scientist has made many clones of himself and an assassin has been assigned to stop him before he makes more! Player 2 must find and kill Player 1 The Scientist . 

A lot of clones are in a room and Player 1 is one of them. Controls: WASD,Arrow Keys for movement.

Player 2 is trying to find, shoot Player 1 with limited time and ammo. Controls: Mouse Movement, Left click to shoot.
